history.proof: hecrush use: app_nil_end, cb_redacc unfold: Red.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In p L Unable to unify "(let (x, _) := p in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA ?M2237 ?M2240 ?M2243 n ltM ?M2246 Q x) (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM ?M2249 ?M2250)" with "(let (x, _) := p in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) (Red L)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In p L Unable to unify "CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA" with "Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (Red L)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In p L Unable to unify "{eqA ?M2233 ?M2234} + {~ eqA ?M2233 ?M2234}" with "(let (x, _) := p in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) (Red L)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In p L Unable to unify "nat" with "Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (Red L)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In p L Unable to unify "Prop" with "Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (Red L)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In p L Unable to unify "{ltM ?M2233 ?M2234} + {ltM ?M2234 ?M2233} + {?M2233 = ?M2234}" with "(let (x, _) := p in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) (Red L)".

original: intros L p H. apply Cb_in with (a := p). - apply cs. - apply eqA_dec. - apply n. - apply ltM. - apply ltM_dec. - auto.
